# dalpiaz

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `dalpiaz` is to house a collection of personal data and analytical functions.

## Installation

You can install the development version from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("daviddalpiaz/data")
```

## Data Import Scripts

Want to see how each data set was imported? Check out the
[`data-raw`](https://github.com/daviddalpiaz/data/tree/master/data-raw) 
folder!
